description.value:
Special: SM Wep, Balanced, Force

Note: Space Marines Only. Master-Crafted Relic Astartes Force Staff of the Blood Ravens Chapter. Grants +20 to Focus Power Tests to channel power into the weapon for additional damage. Requires Psy Rating of 5 (after any modifications) to use the Force Quality.

system.notes: Space Marines Only. Master-Crafted Relic Astartes Force Staff of the Blood Ravens Chapter. Grants +20 to Focus Power Tests to channel power into the weapon for additional damage. Requires Psy Rating of 5 (after any modifications) to use the Force Quality.
